snippet.title: Overblood ~ Intro
snippet.description: The Intro FMV to Riverhill's charmingly clunky and atmospheric 1996 PS1 Horror Adventure, Overblood. As Raz Karcy you abruptly awaken from a cryopod to find yourself suffering from amnesia and fungal infection in a crumbling underground laboratory. Together with your newly found robot friend Pipo, you must escape this deathtrap and uncover your past in the process.
